name: Top Eleven 2018 Soccer Manager
description:
Top Eleven 2019 has arrived with many new features suggested by our global community of soccer managers!

Join over 200 million managers worldwide to become a top soccer manager with the unbeatable excitement of Top Eleven! Build your club from scratch and control every aspect of your team - create your own strategies and formations and take on Jose Mourinho, your friends and millions of other Top Eleven managers on a daily basis.

Begin your journey as a soccer manager today and rise to the very top!

Name your club and build it from the ground up. In Top Eleven 2019 you have the opportunity to control every aspect of your club, from training sessions, transfers, squad selection, formation and tactics set-ups, club finances and jersey designs. In this free multiplayer game you can join forces and compete against friends in real-time or test and improve your skills while playing against other managers from around the globe. Choose official jerseys and emblems from the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, the legendary Champions League and many more football leagues from around the world.

There are Top Eleven soccer managers that have managed their clubs for over 8 years and have won many League, Cup and Champions League titles! Can you win all trophies and claim the treble?

Play Top Eleven and experience all the excitement of being top manager and building a legendary soccer club from scratch.

- Build and develop your stadium with all surrounding facilities.
- Scout & sign the best players in the live transfer market.
- Design your own training sessions to improve your players.
- Master your team’s tactics and formations.
- Challenge other soccer managers daily in competitions and friendlies.
- Give your team instructions and influence the result in the best live-match experience for a soccer manager.
- Team up with friends in weekly clan tournaments
- Compete in the League, Cup, Champions League and Super League!

Join the Top Eleven community on social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube) and stay up-to-date on all the latest news and tips!

***Top Eleven is translated into 30 different languages!***

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, simply contact us at https://nordeus.helpshift.com
Our team offers support in 9 languages.
